title: A-flat major part writing - secondary dom, 4-3 sus

content.question: Write the following progression in four voices, following traditional eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Use only quarter, half, and whole notes.

frqParts.text: Write the following progression in four voices, following traditional eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Use only quarter, half, and whole notes.

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Apply knowledge of common-practice tonality to spell chords and to follow procedures of 18th-century voice leading to connect chords in harmonic progressions.
